submission:
from typing import List

class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, lst: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(lst)
        res = 0
        vis=set()
        check=True

        if k == 1:
            return n

        length = 1
        i = 1
        while i < n + k - 1:
            curr = i
            vis.add(0)
            prev = i - 1

            
            if curr >= n:
                print(check)
                curr -= n
            if prev >= n:
                prev -= n

            if lst[curr] != lst[prev]:
                length += 1
            else:
                print(check)
                length = 1

            if length >= k:
                check=False
                res += 1

            vis.remove(0)
            i += 1
            print(check==False)

        return res
